All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class ChainableRecordListenerDecoratorTest
extends RecordListenerNoRunTest

This class defines the tests that any ChainableRecordListener object should pass.

Version:
$Id: ChainableRecordListenerDecoratorTest.java,v 1.1 2003/05/06 23:02:06 tonyj Exp $

patton
